conclusion: Analyzing Object Interactions Due to Gravity

premise: Objects A and B (the textiles) are placed on top of the arrangement
conclusion: Due to gravity, they will fall onto and conform to the shapes underneath them

premise: The fabrics appear to be flexible materials
conclusion: They will drape over the rigid objects

premise: Object A (blue textile) is placed over object C (purple block) and part of the table (D)
conclusion: Object A would likely drape over object C and part of the table
